reporter_caption.center: BERMAN v. B.C.E. CORP., et al., 295 Pa. Super. 531 (1981)

caption.center: Berman, Appellant, v. B.C.E. Corp., et al.

opinion.posture: Civil proceedings. Trespass. Before McCRUDDEN, J. No. 2594 Oct. T., 1979. Appeal from the order of the Court of Common Pleas of Philadelphia County, Civil Division, No. 1869, May T., 1979. Argued December 1, 1980.
opinion.attorneys: Neil A. Morris, for appellant; Gary A. Rochestie, for B.C.E. Corp., appellee; Paul F. Lantieri, did not file a brief on behalf of Criniti Sons, appellees; James J. Jandrisitz, did not file a brief on behalf of Philadelphia Authority, appellee.
opinion.panel: Before SPAETH, BROSKY and HOFFMAN, JJ.
opinion.opinion_text: The order of the lower court is hereby affirmed.Page 532
